cyclone.name: CLAUDETTE
cyclone.current_location: about 290 mi SSE of Nantucket, Massachusetts
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northeastward, paralleling the U.S. East Coast well offshore and heading toward Nova Scotia/Newfoundland
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near or just south of Nova Scotia, Canada (possible post-tropical encounter)

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Offshore waters east of the Mid-Atlantic, Cape Cod to Nova Scotia and Newfoundland
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: Not listed (probabilities only provided for Canadian stations)
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds are expected at Baltimore; only typical summertime breezes.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated rip-current risk at Mid-Atlantic beaches, but no direct port impacts expected.
